title: WTB: MC T206 or similar, back only

posts.post_title: WTB: MC T206 or similar, back only
posts.post_content: Looking for a top to bottom miscut of the back only, prefer 25% or more but will consider any.  (Similar to one shown although i dont own it, borrowed it from google) Open to other t-cards as well. Send scans and price to [url]madolfi1968@yahoo.com[/url]
